entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:40 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle or flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:40 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle or flurries early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:40 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
